messages.subject: For Sale
messages.msgSnippet: I have an original 2 poster set of The 47 Ronin The last time I was in Japan, I tracked down the burial site of the 47, and was in awe of the reverance still
messages.messageBody:
I have an original 2 poster set of "The 47 Ronin" The last time I
was in Japan, I tracked down the burial site of the 47, and was in
awe of the reverance still given these guys. It is my favorite story
of all time. If you haven't read it, I recommend it highly. For
those of you who have, and enjoyed it as much as I did, these
posters are a must have. They are in mint condition, all in
Japanese. This was purchased on site at the burial grounds. I also
have a tea cup, depicting a scene from the story. I have no idea
what these are worth, but a recent divorce forces me to sell.All
offers will be considered, but do not insult me, I really hate to
get rid of these. I have lots of other art work of the 47 ronin, by
an artist Hisashi Otsuka. If you are familiar with his work, we
could talk.
My email is terryw98241@...
